comments.en:
Note : Printer internal counters always count a COLOR print, even if you print black documents with the PCL driver set to "grayscale". This matters because many users of such printers pay maintenance depending on page counters, and color prints (or counted as such) are much more expensive than black prints...
Foomatic entry made by PPDtoXML T/G 0.20 on 2008-09-06
